name: The Hermit (itch)
description:
In this fetch quest, you play as the hermit of Pickwyrt Woods, Mogg. 

A few tips to help you:

  • Read carefully
  • Remember what you've already picked up
  • You may pick up items before they're asked for, and NPCs will respond (eventually)
  • Use the signposts to help you
  • The gander and gosling are in the kitchen yard, and the mother goose is inside the fence

Created with Bitsy Game Maker and Borksy

I spent way too much time researching Medieval life for this game, but it's an amalgamation of things - not exactly accurate. The juggler in the marketplace will either sing you a real Medieval love song or ask you riddles. Also, the dragon spell that Fynn uses was created with Google translate - feel free to decode it! 

Also, you can earn at least two coins, which you can't spend in this game.

I'm hoping to create and release a sequel. Maybe.

Let me know if you encounter any bugs, or get stuck.

Thanks for playing!
